column4: I must be missing something here. Amd64 system, new hoary install, trying to install the fglrx drivers. The system shows that fglrx loads in dmesg, But when I specify for x.org to use the fglrx driver. The system hardlocks up and i have to power it off and reboot it.
do they already do amd64 at ATI?
doesnt say they do, but there is suppsosed to be support in amd64 hoary for ati's fglrx driver
